item.title: Mushi Jingi Mezase! Saikyou no Mushi Nushi announced for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Due out on November 13 in Japan.

Nippon Columbia has announced Mushi Jingi Mezase! Saikyou no Mushi Nushi, a video game based on the DAISO original card game Mushi Jingi. It will launch for Switch on November 13 in Japan for 5,800 yen (6,380 yen with tax).

Mushi Jingi Mezase! Saikyou no Mushi Nushi features a total of 437 cards, from the starter set released in November 2022 to the latest Booster Pack 6. Players will aim to become the “Ultimate Insect Master” as they progress through the story, battle against various characters, and build their ideal deck. The game supports solo play, as well as both online and local battles. Deck organization is equipped with various useful functions such a filter feature to narrow down cards by “type,” “cost,” “attribute,” “rarity,” and “set,” as well as a battle-tested deck recipe viewer.

Visit the official website for here.

item.title: Cronos: The New Dawn ‘A New Breed of Horror’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Cats, orphans, ad ruins of The New Dawn.

Bloober Team has released a new trailer for third-person survival horror game Cronos: The New Dawn dubbed “A New Breed of Horror.”

Get the latest details below.

The trailer opens from a cat’s-eye view—an eerie, ground-level perspective that turns the familiar into something surreal. As if the trailer wasn’t enough, The Traveler made a dramatic appearance on stage in full cosplay—stepping out of the void and into the spotlight, blurring the line between the game and reality.

Cronos: The New Dawn is a third-person survival horror game developed by the renowned horror studio Bloober Team, best known for the critically acclaimed Silent Hill 2 remake.

The game is built around a powerful, original narrative that unfolds in New Dawn – an abstract reinterpretation of the real Nowa Huta district in Kraków, Poland. The story is told across two contrasting timelines: a post-apocalyptic future and the gritty industrial reality of the 1980s. This unique setting blends retro realism with dystopian science-fiction and a retro futuristic atmosphere, creating a deeply immersive world filled with tension, mystery, and psychological depth.

At this year’s Gamescom Opening Night Live, a stunning new cinematic trailer premiered on the main stage—featuring a surprise appearance by none other than The Traveler.

The trailer immerses us in the haunting ruins of New Dawn, beginning with a mysterious sequence that follows the movements of a cat through the desolate landscape. From there, it transitions into cinematic shots of The Traveler – the game’s central figure—whose journey we’ll follow throughout the game. We’re shown gripping, high-stakes encounters as The Traveler faces off against The Orphans—terrifying creatures that haunt this broken world. All of this plays out against the haunting soundtrack of “Sixteen Days / Gathering Dust” by This Mortal Coil, heightening the sense of mystery and atmosphere.

Cronos: The New Dawn is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 5.

item.title: Fantasy Maiden Wars: Dream of the Stray Dreamer for PC launches October 21 worldwide
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Touhou Project strategy RPG dated.

Touhou Project strategy RPG Fantasy Maiden Wars: Dream of the Stray Dreamer will launch for PC via Steam on October 21 worldwide, publisher Phoenixx and developer Sanbondo announced. It will support English and Japanese language options.

Fantasy Maiden Wars: Dream of the Stray Dreamer first launched for Switch on March 31, 2022 in Japan. The Switch version is also planned for a western release in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A full-scale strategy RPG set in the world of Gensokyo.

Fantasy Maiden Wars: Dream of the Stray Dreamer is a classic tactical RPG where you command a diverse cast of characters and battle your way through stage-based missions.

Set in Gensokyo, a world where humans, youkai, and gods coexist, you’ll team up with over 70 unique allies to confront a series of supernatural incidents shaking the land.

Classic Tactical RPG Gameplay

Deploy your units across grid-based maps, take down enemies with strategic positioning and turn-based tactics, and clear stages to progress the story.

Multiple difficulty levels and a full-featured tutorial system make this a perfect entry point for players new to the genre—while offering plenty of depth for veterans.

Dynamic Combat Animations

Engage in beautifully animated battles whenever characters clash. From sword slashes and gunfire to devastating Spell Card finishers, every attack is brought to life with flair.

Watch your favorite characters unleash flashy moves in the rich, vibrant world of Gensokyo.

Over 70 Playable Characters and Deep Customization

Customize your squad between missions in the Intermission screen—equip gear, assign skills, and build the dream team your way.

Each character has unique traits and signature abilities, opening the door to countless team compositions and strategies. Go all-in on your favorites or hunt down the most broken combos—how you play is up to you.

A Massive Story Blending the Touhou Universe

Choose between shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei or magician Marisa Kirisame as your protagonist—your choice will impact parts of the story.

The game weaves together reinterpretations of storylines from across the Touhou Project series, uniting them into a single, epic narrative arc for both newcomers and longtime fans.

More Than Just a Game—Dive into the World of Touhou

Beyond the gameplay, enjoy a rich selection of bonus content:

  • A detailed character and terminology encyclopedia that introduces the world of Touhou.
  • A massive music room with over 200 tracks from the game.

Perfect for both Touhou veterans and those just beginning their journey into Gensokyo.

item.title: Crescent Tower now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Available at an $8.99 launch discount price.

8-bit 2D dungeon RPG Crescent Tower is now available for PC via Steam at a 10 percent-off launch discount price of $8.99, publisher AMATA Games and developer Curry Croquette announced. It supports English, French, German, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Korean language options. The price will change to $9.99 after September 2.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A story woven from courage.

A fusion of nostalgia and novelty awaits you!

An authentic 8-bit style dungeon crawler RPG packed with retro style, intended for the NES generation and all RPG fans!

Story

Crescent Tower, an unprecedented dungeon that appears just once every 50 years in the Imperial Capital Mayirdoam.

No one knows what lies at the top, yet rumors abound of a jewel that grants any wish the heart desires and of a potion of immortality. To finally discover what lies at the top of such a mysterious tower, nameless adventurers flock to Mayirdoam…

You were one of those brave souls who set out to venture into this Crescent Tower.

Key Features

  • Simple Turn-Based Battles – Easy to pick up but highly strategic turn-based battles. Pixel art characters wage combat on a side-view battle screen!
  • Choose a Character From Three Races x Nine Classes – Freely create your own character from 3 races and 9 classes (jobs) at the Adventurers’ Guild! Your character will grow ever stronger by repeatedly changing jobs while transferring skills already learned.
  • View All 10 Levels of the Dungeon From a 2D Top-Down Perspective – Explore all 10 levels of the dungeon from a 2D, top-down perspective. The search area around you will expand by lighting torches to ensure visibility.
  • The Dungeon is Filled With Traps and Mysteries… Map It Out as You Proceed! – The 10-level dungeon is littered with various traps. The key to success is to advance while mapping out the area a little bit at a time.
  • Game Length – 10 to 20 hours on average!

Watch the launch trailer below.

item.title: CINDER CITY – Gamescom 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

The "massively multiplayer online tactical shooter" from NCSOFT.

Publisher NCSOFT and developer BigFire Games have released the Gamescom 2025 trailer for “massively multiplayer online tactical shooter” CINDER CITY.

As previously announced, CINDER CITY will feature “dynamic, high-fidelity graphics” in a “seamless open world” powered by Unreal Engine 5. The game is an alternate history science-fiction story where 23rd century future technology intersects with the 21st century. Set in a post-apocalyptic Seoul modeled after real-world locations such as Samseong-dong and Nonhyeon-dong, it promises realistic combat mechanics that “authentically replicate” firearm operations.

CINDER CITY is in development for unspecified consoles and PC. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch the trailer below.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb expansion ‘Woolhaven’ announced
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Devolver Digital and developer Massive Monster have announced Cult of the Lamb expansion “Woolhaven.” It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the update, via Devolver Digital:

About

A lost God calls you from a mysterious mountain: you must rebuild the flock and reawaken winter to uncover the truth of the fallen lambs. Face the past before it consumes you in this full-length, feature-packed expansion.

Key Features

  • Return the lost souls of Woolhaven to their spiritual home and learn the long-forgotten history of lambkind. Rebuild the fallen town to its former glory and reclaim the mountain to restore the depleted power of Yngya, the forgotten God of the lambs. But beware: there is always a price to be paid.
  • Endure harsh weather, including blizzards and freezing temperatures, that threaten your Cult’s survival. Build new structures to keep your loyal followers warm and protect them from frostbite and famine.
  • Unlock ranching at your Cult base and breed rare animals that provide wool, warmth and when times are particularly desperate, precious meat. Tame, ride and let your followers take care of these majestic creatures.
  • Venture into a new realm battered by bitter storms, crawling with creatures corrupted with the Rot lurking beneath the snow. Battle through two vast new dungeons, where the echoes of the past refuse to rest.

Every soul redeemed on the mountain defiles it further, threatening all of The Lands of the Old Faith. Can you undo the sins of the past?

Cult of the Lamb is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II DLC ‘Legacy of the Forge’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on September 9.

Publisher Deep Silver and developer Warhorse Studios have announced Kingdom Come: Deliverance II story expansion downloadable content “Legacy of the Forge.” It will launch on September 9 for $13.99.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via Deep Silver:

About

Returning to Kuttenberg, Henry puts his blacksmithing skills to the test to acquire and repair a legendary burnt-down forge, where his father, Martin, spent his youth as an apprentice. Venturing down memory lane, Henry learns of his father’s legacy as a blacksmith, revealing a part of his life that has remained hidden until now. Gaining new blacksmith prestige, Henry becomes a forge master, helping the people of Kuttenberg with sword crafting, armor-smithing, and other quirky requests.

In addition to new daily quests, Henry will unlock the ability to earn cash, enabling a brand-new home customization system with over 136 million combinations to personalize Henry’s very own forge, private quarters, and its surroundings. Once decked out, the forge becomes a place to return to and call home. How you choose to design Henry’s home has a direct impact on your gameplay. Players must choose between aesthetics and utility, but over time, everything can be upgraded.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Henry’s Very Own Home – Personalize your forge, private quarters, and its surroundings with brand-new design features, allowing you to build a unique home with a customization system that offers over 100 million combinations.
  • Continue Henry’s Journey of Discovery – Return to Kuttenberg and venture down memory lane. Meeting acquaintances of your late father, turning strangers into allies in a meaningful pursuit to achieve your family’s legacy. Uncover a part of your father’s life that has remained hidden – until now.
  • Enhance Your Blacksmithing Skills – Rise through the ranks to become the master of Kuttenberg’s blacksmith guild, taking on blacksmithing commissions that will bolster your reputation. Unlock unique blueprints for new armor and weapons all while helping the people of Kuttenberg with sword crafting, armor-smithing, and some more quirky requests.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin PS5 and PC closed beta test announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Watch the latest trailer.

Publisher Netmarble and developer Netmarble F&C have opened closed beta test registration for free-to-play open-world action RPG The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin, the companies announced. It will be held across PlayStation 5 and PC.

Here are the latest details:

The newly released trailer, narrated by Meliodas who is the protagonist of The Seven Deadly Sins, introduces the game’s world and key features. The footage showcases high-quality visual upgrades and the vast open-world continent of Britannia. Players can freely explore underwater environments, soar through the skies, and engage in a wide variety of activities such as fishing, puzzles, and aerial adventures. The trailer also gives a sneak peek at the game’s intense battles and unique combat style against powerful foes like Monster Albion and Gray Demons.

The trailer concludes with the global closed beta test announcement. The closed beta offers a rare opportunity for players worldwide to experience the game ahead of its official launch. Players can apply by visiting the official brand website, submitting their email address, and completing a short survey. Selected participants and detailed scheduling will be announced at a later date.

Releasing in 2025, The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin is based on The Seven Deadly Sins, the popular Japanese manga and anime IP that has reached 55 million copies in global sales worldwide. The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin will feature a multiverse storyline original to the game and an expansive open world across the continent of Britannia. Players can collect heroes from The Seven Deadly Sins and Four Knights of the Apocalypse to customize their combat style and shape their own adventure.

The game has continued to build momentum through several appearances at major global gaming events. Following the trailer reveals at Summer Game Fest and the Future Games Show in June, The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin returned to the spotlight at Gamescom 2025 Opening Night Live. It will also make an appearance at Tokyo Game Show in September, solidifying its status as one of the most anticipated RPGs of the year.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin is due out for PlayStation 5, PC via Steam, iOS, and Android in 2025.

item.title: Neverness to Everness – Gamescom 2025 ‘Hethereau Exclusive Feature’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Playable on PlayStation 5 and PC at Gamescom 2025.

Publisher Perfect World Games and developer Hotta Studio have released a new trailer for free-to-play supernatural urban open-world RPG Neverness to Everness, as well as detailed the game’s Gamescom 2025 experience.

Here are the details:

About

Gamescom attendees have the chance to compete for exclusive event rewards at the booth through the show, meet the development team, and explore the city streets of Neverness to Everness. Once they’ve pre-registered for the game and followed the official Twitter account, guests can claim an Neverness to Everness Gamescom 2025 bag and character sticker sheet by speaking to staff at the booth’s entrance.

They’ll also be able to participate in a lucky draw with a chance to win additional Neverness to Everness merchandise, including badges, Taygedo fans, and holographic cards. To gain entry, attendees will have to complete the 15-minute game demo at the booth, record themselves playing it (using the on-site phone stands) and upload the footage onto their social media channel, before showing their post to staff in the area.

Full information on the activities can be found on the official landing page at https://pwgam.es/4m7tA4l

PlayStation Game Hub Now Open

Neverness to Everness will also be playable on PlayStation 5 at gamescom. Console gamers will get to experience the title’s sprawling, reality-inspired urban environments, high-speed vehicular action, and supernatural encounters—all running seamlessly on PlayStation hardware.

The Neverness to Everness PlayStation game hub has also opened, providing information about the game, access to community features, and more, including the ability to wishlist now!

Powered by NVIDIA Geforce RTX 50 Series and TCL Displays

Neverness to Everness‘ path tracing, powered by GeForce RTX 50 Series and NVIDlA DLSS 4, will make its debut at Gamescom, bringing the game’s supernatural urban world to life through advanced lighting, reflections, and shadows.

At the booth, players can experience NTE with NVIDlA DLSS 4 featuring Multi Frame Generation, delivering exceptional image quality and performance as seen in the game’s recently held Containment Test.

All gameplay will be showcased on TCL 27R83U monitors, ensuring crystal-clear visuals and ultra-smooth performance for every visitor.

Here is an overview of the game, via Perfect World Games:

About

Neverness to Everness is a supernatural open-world RPG developed by Hotta Studio. The story begins in the city of Hethereau, where you play as the first “unlicensed” Anomaly Hunter. You will join the antique shop Eibon, which relies on taking on Anomaly commissions from the public to stay afloat. Alongside your diverse and extraordinary partners, you’ll explore various urban mysteries, experiencing an array of adventures filled with laughter and tears, and crafting your unique urban saga.

Strange City, Strange Adventures

Welcome to the first stop in your appraisal career—Hethereau, a bustling and open metropolis!

In the bustling Bureau of Anomaly Control hall, hopeful Oddities queue up for their resident permits, while at the train station, an Esper commuter snaps his fingers to clean his work suit in a hurry. On one side of the street, a chaotic chase after Danzaburou is unfolding, while at the other end, a vacationing silver-gloved Butler chats amiably with the owner of a second-hand electronics shop. Everywhere you look, there’s an abundance of intriguingly “abnormal” scenes!

Want to delve deeper into this world where humans and the supernatural coexist? Start your journey in Hethereau to witness, experience, and document it firsthand! The lively and quirky daily life here is a grand adventure in itself.

Interesting Stories, Lighthearted Connections

  • Today’s Top Story – Rumors swirl about a mysterious pawnshop that only appears on the night of the full moon each month. What will you pledge for your wish?
  • Breaking News – Taygedo’s romance crisis! Romance and impulsiveness, heartbreak and missed opportunities! Miss Tako, the object of a secret crush, is about to move away from Hethereau with her guarantor. How will the lovestruck otter convey his feelings before it’s too late?
  • Reliable Insider Info – The photo studio “Film Orbit Studio” has reopened! All members of the Eibon Antique Shop enjoy exclusive discounts!
  • Weather Update – The Anomaly Rainman is entering an active phase, so be sure to carry rain gear when you go out~

That’s all for today’s “10AM” broadcast. Stay tuned for mysterious Anomalies, unbreakable “Oaths,” and the ever-growing shadow of the colossal “Circle” organization, becoming clearer in the fragmented echoes of “Prophecies”…

Encounters and Bonds

Explore the mysterious shops in secluded alleys, meet the enigmatic shop owners, the high powerlevel bodyguards, the “jack-of-all-trades” robotic butlers, the troublemakers who can’t stay out of problems, and the TV-headed repairmen with curious eating habits!

—As a member of Eibon, you’ll always have energetic companions on your lively adventures!

Expand your social map starting from the bustling Hankaku Street! Courageously meet more faction members and freely add them as “Bagel” friends!

From the harmonious neighborhood of street shops to the unique hunter organizations, countless tales await in the side stories, ready for you to gather friends and forge bonds far and wide!

Customize Your Urban Lifestyle

Freely explore your city, choosing familiar routines or daring to try new things!

Customize your car and speed through bustling streets to feel the city’s heartbeat, or take a ride on the Ghost Train to traverse Anomaly spaces and reach your destination in a flash.

In your downtime, will you visit the old shops on Hankaku Street to browse the secret seasonal goods, or will you purchase a cozy home and redecorate it to your liking?

Listen to your heart, follow your own pace, and immerse yourself in the vibrant city that embraces your trust, rewarding you with colorful, memorable days.

Neverness to Everness will be available for PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android. A release date has yet to be announced.
